content: 1st brim row 2 6 fasten_off join yarn in the 22nd st from your chain 1 at the back of the hat you will be working around the beanie joining the two brims together working in ends of row and around the edge of both brims single_crochet decrease over 1st 2 sts of the corner of the right side of the brim single_crochet in ends of the next 3 row single_crochet in the next 22 sts around the front of the brim single_crochet in the ends of the next 3 row on the other side of brim single_crochet decrease in next 2 sts in corner of brim 30 sts so far continuing around the side of the beanie single_crochet in next 22 sts join with slip_stitch to beginning chain at back of beanie fasten_off finish off
